channel.title: FIXED! Just had to copy one of the other spawns
channel.description:
Here's the error The Bronze Age server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 038 3203 3433 0 0 0 0 0 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1970) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:551) at server.main(server.java:111)
I don't know what I'm doing wrong please explain, Any help is appreciated. Oh yeah and the spawn code I'm using is spawn = 3038 3203 3433 0 0 0 0 0 1 And using bronze age base.

item.title: FIXED! Just had to copy one of the other spawns
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

I’m sure having something for example tabbing the spaces wrong was the problem though.

Yes, it was.

Read full topic

item.title: FIXED! Just had to copy one of the other spawns
item.dc:creator: @jabezxa jabezxa
item.description:
@jabezxa wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:7, topic:365392"]Send me your NPCspawn.cfg or whatever you’re using; Upload it to www.pastebin.com

Copy and paste all of the autospawn.cfg and paste it onto pastebin[/quote]
Thanks everyone for replying, I just copied the original spawn script then replaced the npc id/pos with mine.

Read full topic

item.title: FIXED! Just had to copy one of the other spawns
item.dc:creator: @jabezxa jabezxa
item.description:
@jabezxa wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:5, topic:365392"]Try this;

spawn = 3038	3203	3433	0	0	0	0	0	1

Use the tab key, instead of space bar. Use tab to avoid errors.

EDIT;

spawn = 3200 3275 3914 0 1 40 450 550 Chaos Ele

npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description[/quote][quote="#Haste, post:5, topic:365392"]Try this;

spawn = 3038	3203	3433	0	0	0	0	0	1

Use the tab key, instead of space bar. Use tab to avoid errors.

EDIT;

spawn = 3200 3275 3914 0 1 40 450 550 Chaos Ele

npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description[/quote]
Both of them didn’t work. Ahhhh any other suggestions?

Read full topic
